group_1.textRight: T-This is incredible...

group_1.textLeft: Outsiders aren't allowed on school grounds,@you know.

group_1.textRight: I got proper permission to tour the place.

group_1.textCenter: Huu... Today's work has finally ceased.

group_1.textRight: ... Mifuyu, why is it you're here?

group_1.textLeft: Though I did receive permission,
wandering around the school too much would@make me suspicious...
But I did end up finding Karin's manga, so I have@been reading that.

group_1.textRight: Fool girl's manga?

group_1.textLeft: "The Pumpkin King and the Ghost Servant"...@It was lying on the table here.
This is what she spoke of at the hospital,
her Halloween-themed manga, no?

group_1.textRight: Is that so?@But this is Alina's first time seeing it?

group_1.textLeft: It has to be it.
I received a message from Karin that it was@completed.
She told me the title of it as well...
But, she has yet to show you it?

group_1.textRight: Si.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, then that ghost servant costume
was not yours, but Karin's decision.

group_1.textRight: ... What is the reason for a ghost dressed like@this in that manga?
Let Alina see.

group_1.textLeft: Here, help yourself.
It really captures the Halloween spirit and is quite@interesting as well.

group_1.textRight: ... Shit. It's getting even worse now.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ehhh?!@I don't agree with that at all!
The art in it...@She's not necessarily great at it,
but she brings out the true spirit of Halloween@in its theme...

group_1.textRight: She listened to the opinions of others and@drew them as is, si?

group_1.textLeft: But everyone seems to enjoy the happy ending...

group_1.textRight: Probably only to suit the tastes of who she@wanted to prove to.
To start, when the sinners are released from@purgatory,
Halloween comes to an end.
No matter how you look at it,
this is not an ending the idiota would be satisfied@with drawing...
It's clear she lies to herself and is flattering@her readers.

group_1.textLeft: Eh--@But...!
It is you who advised her to listen to her@readers, no?

group_1.textRight: Fool girl said a similar thing...
However, Alina gave no such advice.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: ... Wanting to prove oneself to another--@Working to draw with such motivation--
I have no such interest.
Alina paints only what Alina wants to paint.
Alina doesn't have the know-how for being@evaluated by others,
because her memory is lost, yeah.

group_1.textLeft: Alina knows nothing of painting to prove oneself to others.
If you want to be recognized by the gallery,@then instead of relying on Alina,
don't you think you should ask the opinion of the gallery?
(Is that not... still advice...?)
(Was that just you saying...@"I do not know, so do not ask me"...?)
B-But... She has become so much more@expressive than before,
and I think there was value in her listening to@everyone's opinions, too...

group_1.textRight: It's only a difference of good trash and bad trash.

group_1.textLeft: What more could I say...@Compared to before, she has much more originality.

group_1.textRight: Haa...
Alina is interested in intrinsic art...
That is the kind of artwork that comes from@within the creator.
Alina does not understand why one would make a manga
that is nothing but an imitation of Magical Kirin.
It was much better when her impulses would@ooze out, yes.
This is why Alina cannot feel any brilliance@from this manga.

group_1.textLeft: (Ahh... I just remembered.)
(Yacchan did say that Karin)
(is a good girl, however)
(she is a child who makes many mistakes.)
(I don't know what makes art good or bad...)
(So for her to listen to everyone and create@such a wonderful work as this,)
(I cannot think of it as a mistake...)
(But, in the eyes of the genius named Alina,)
(Karin's work this time showed that she has@lost sight of herself,)
(that she is straying off course.@... That is what it looks like to you, does it not?)
(I...@I do not understand...)
(What is right... Or what is wrong.)
Um... If you were to grade this manga,
what would you give it out of 100 points?

group_1.textRight: 0 points.

group_1.textCenter: Alina wants you to get her back to her original@form though...
